page.title: 09POPULATION
page.content: THE POPULATION IS SMALL,- SOME 230 ADULTS AND 75 CHILDREN(18-). THERE IS A HIGH DEGREE OF PENSIONERS MAINLY BECAUSE THEY FIRST CAME TO SETTLE IN THE VILLAGE AS YOUNG PEOPLE TO WORK IN THE DEPOT. THE BIRTH RATE HAS ALSO BEEN LOW, ALTHOUGH TWO FAMILIES EACH HAVE SEVEN CHILDREN. THIS IS MUCH THE EXCEPTION, WITH TWO CHILDREN AS THE USUAL. ANOTHER FACTOR IS THAT MANY OF THE YOUNGER FAMILIES HAVE OPTED TO BUY THEIR OWN HOMES, THIS NECESSITATING LEAVING THE VILLAGE SINCE NO PRIVATE HOUSING IS EITHER FOR SALE OR CAN BE BUILT. THE POSSIBILITY THE BARHAM ROAD AND HILL ROAD WILL BE DEMOLISHED HAS ALSO ACCELERATED DEPARTURE AND HINDERED INCOMING.
